text:
Crime and Punishment  
Part I  

On a very hot evening in early July, a young man came out of the small room where he lived and walked slowly, as if he was unsure, towards K. bridge.  

He had managed to avoid running into his landlady on the stairs. His room was at the top of a tall, five-story building and was more like a closet than a real room. The landlady, who gave him his room, meals, and help, lived one floor below him.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A young man hesitates as he leaves his cramped garret on a hot July evening.
